channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My life partner is 18 years my senior. He wants to leave his $4.5 million fortune to me — not his two kids. Do we tell them?
item.description: “No doubt they would feel the arrangement is unfair, and that would potentially end our relationship.”

item.title: Why the government’s debt problem is your borrowing problem — but also your opportunity to save
item.description: People shopping for a car loan or a mortgage should understand the implications of high bond yields.

item.title: Tesla sales plunge in France, showing Elon Musk may have a long way to go to restore the brand
item.description: Tesla’s sales have been under pressure in Europe, even after the rollout of a souped-up Model Y.

item.title: ‘I am getting very frustrated’: My mother’s adviser has not returned my calls. He manages $1 million. Is this normal?
item.description: “I am not used to this way of doing business.”

item.title: Popular ‘zero-day’ options saw record share of trading volume in May as retail traders piled in
item.description: The share of trading volume in S&P 500-linked options contracts on the verge of expiration surged to a fresh record high in May, marking the latest mi...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
